I am currently a lead developper at a small company (40 people, 10 developers.) We provide enterprise solutions in two domains: Interactive terminals and Mobile apps/web.

The CEO is asking me to set up an offshore outsourcing office/branch in Vietnam with 7 people, including 5 developers.

I am looking for any advices/resources/directions that can help me relise the project.

Thank you!
title: Ask HN: Books/Resources/Advices to set up a new outsourcing office/branch
